posts.body:
>>40e9c59b-1465-4260-9d64-670e88037ec7
> A Millchan certificate will be created for you if you make a post without having a certificate on Millchan.
Okay, but why dev didn't implement it here?
>Not sure how you accomplished that.
If you clone this hub ZeroNet will create a new empty hub for you and your private key will be in the data/users.json file
By the way I solved this problem. It was exist because I didn't have a millchan certificate. So I think, that dev-san should add a certificate generator to the merger version too.

>>13a271fb-e2a7-49c4-a43f-6dc96255abd1
>  hubs to only accept @zeroid 
Okay got it.
And what about moderation of those hubs. How owner can be do it? Only editing .json files in text editors?

>>82ad08c4-3bb5-41c9-946f-c2f6f34988f5
So, how to delete only particular post from user but not all posts?

>>c01ae8b1-c831-411a-9894-2b6cea5154a2
Great instruction, thanks. But is it possible to use it on original Millchan without any Hubs?

>>0b97ef74-f29a-42b7-a12d-6e42c3413290
For me it's just curious why I can do that here and can't do that on original Millchan. Is it a bug or dev-san just plan this already?
